## AlTriggeredEvent class

Represents a typed event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AlTriggeredEvent<ResponseType> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [anyResponseEquals(targetValue)](./common.altriggeredevent.anyresponseequals.md) |  | Returns true if any response matches the given value, or false otherwise. |
|  [anyResponseWith(checkCallback)](./common.altriggeredevent.anyresponsewith.md) |  | Returns true if the given callback returns true for any of the responses, or false otherwise. |
|  [getEventType()](./common.altriggeredevent.geteventtype.md) |  | Retrieves type name |
|  [respond(response)](./common.altriggeredevent.respond.md) |  | Allows hooks to provide feedback/responses to the triggering agent |
|  [response()](./common.altriggeredevent.response.md) |  | Retrieves the first response (or returns undefined), removing it from the list of responses. |
